member.name: QUEUE_USER_APC_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the modifier flags for user-mode asynchronous procedure call (APC) objects.

member.name: QUEUE_USER_APC_FLAGS.QUEUE_USER_APC_FLAGS_NONE
member.summary: No flags are passed. Behavior is identical to .

member.name: QUEUE_USER_APC_FLAGS.QUEUE_USER_APC_FLAGS_SPECIAL_USER_APC
member.summary: Queue a special user-mode APC instead of a regular user-mode APC.

member.name: QUEUE_USER_APC_FLAGS.QUEUE_USER_APC_CALLBACK_DATA_CONTEXT
member.summary: Receive the processor context that was interrupted when the thread was directed to call the APC function.
